name: Google
description: Google integration allows a Polarity user to retrieve and display search results from Google programmatically. Just like searching Google directly.

options.name: Show Search Disclaimer
options.description: If enabled, the integration will show a disclaimer the user must accept before running a search.

options.name: Search Disclaimer Content
options.description: A disclaimer that users must review before the integration will submit questions to the Google Search API.
options.default: Please affirm that no confidential information will be shared with your submission to Google. Click Accept to run your search.

options.name: Disclaimer Interval
options.description: How often to display the disclaimer to users. Restarting the integration will reset the interval timer.

default.display: All searches - disclaimer will be shown before every search (default)

options.display: All searches - disclaimer will be shown before every new search (default)
Every 24 hours - disclaimer will be shown once per day
Every week - disclaimer will be shown once per week

options.name: Maximum Number of Results to Return
options.description: Maximum number of search results to return
